en.cmd.toggle_desc: Toggle between text view and spreadsheet view for CSV/TSV files
en.cmd.open_desc: Open current CSV/TSV buffer as interactive spreadsheet
en.cmd.open_file_desc: Open a CSV/TSV file as interactive spreadsheet
en.help.navigate: Arrow keys to navigate, Tab for next cell
en.help.edit: Enter to edit, Escape to cancel
en.help.save: s to save, q to close
